remarks: Part of proof of part 12 in [Baer] p. 49 line 5, (a-b)S = aS-bS in their notation (S = sigma).  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap12c.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap12c.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12c.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap12c.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
hdmap12c.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12c.n $e |- N = ( -g ` C ) $.
hdmap12c.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12c.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap12c.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmap12c.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapsub $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` ( X .- Y ) ) = ( ( S ` X ) N ( S ` Y ) ) ) $.
